Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 23rd overall pick, by Detroit in 2009...
Injured on 5/16/2009 with a Bruised Foot, out for 4 days...
Injured on 5/28/2011 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 4/9/2014, off Shawn Hill (KCA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/12/2014, off Michael Adams (LAA)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Minnesota on 7/3/2014...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/11/2014 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 2014...
Drove in 6 runs against Minnesota on 8/22/2016...
Won World Championship with Detroit in 2017...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 8/30/2020...
Injured on 9/23/2020 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/23/2021 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/8/2023 to a 3-year deal worth $1,070,000 per year...
